question: Large businesses have big budgets for marketing and promotion and as result, people gravitate towards buying their products. What problems does this cause?
text: Big Corporations and international trademarks spend a huge amount on marketing and advertising.Consequently, consumers prefer to buy branded goods from these communities, while small local companies fail to reach  potential consumers.This can lead to some problems, such as clouser the business, unemployment , make monopoly in the markets.There is a viable solution to this problem by creating special conditions via decreasing taxes and extra funding .
